label: ExperienceItem
comment: A collection of information specific to the involvement of a person or persons in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour being used or reported on for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of quantity unit applicable for this experience product.
An available product for this specified experience item.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
A destination, expressed as text, for this specified experience item.
The indication of whether or not guest special care is applicable for this specified experience item.
An indemnity clause, expressed as text, for this experience event.
An instruction, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A reservation guarantee, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A theme, expressed as text, for this experience product.
The code specifying the type of theme for this experience product.
